name: KU-KU Shooter
description:
I was inspired by this game : https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=3948

This game is about shooting the enemies that have the answers to the multiplication questions that appear at the top of the screen.

Keep answering the questions correctly to score points until you run out of 4 lives and the game is over.

You lose one life by hitting an enemy, being hit by an enemy bullet, or answering a question incorrectly.

If you answer a question correctly, you will regain one life.

How to play

Arrow key:  The fighter will move in the direction you press.

Z key :  Fires bullets.

Thanks for playing, and have fun!
